Uses of Interface
java.rmi.server.RemoteRef

  • Packages that use RemoteRef 
    Package Description
    java.rmi.activation
    Provides support for RMI Object Activation.
    java.rmi.server
    Provides classes and interfaces for supporting the server side of RMI.
    javax.management.remote.rmi
    The RMI connector is a connector for the JMX Remote API that uses RMI to transmit client requests to a remote MBean server.

    • Uses of RemoteRef in java.rmi.activation

      Constructors in java.rmi.activation with parameters of type RemoteRef 
      Constructor and Description
      ActivationGroup_Stub(RemoteRef ref)
      Constructs a stub for the ActivationGroup class.

    • Uses of RemoteRef in java.rmi.server

      Subinterfaces of RemoteRef in java.rmi.server 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  ServerRef
      A ServerRef represents the server-side handle for a remote object implementation.
      Fields in java.rmi.server declared as RemoteRef 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected RemoteRef RemoteObject.ref
      The object's remote reference.
      Methods in java.rmi.server that return RemoteRef 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      RemoteRef RemoteObject.getRef()
      Returns the remote reference for the remote object.
      Methods in java.rmi.server with parameters of type RemoteRef 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean RemoteRef.remoteEquals(RemoteRef obj)
      Compares two remote objects for equality.
      protected static void RemoteStub.setRef(RemoteStub stub, RemoteRef ref)
      Deprecated. 
      no replacement. The setRef method is not needed since RemoteStubs can be created with the RemoteStub(RemoteRef) constructor.
      Constructors in java.rmi.server with parameters of type RemoteRef 
      Constructor and Description
      RemoteObject(RemoteRef newref)
      Creates a remote object, initialized with the specified remote reference.
      RemoteObjectInvocationHandler(RemoteRef ref)
      Creates a new RemoteObjectInvocationHandler constructed with the specified RemoteRef.
      RemoteServer(RemoteRef ref)
      Constructs a RemoteServer with the given reference type.
      RemoteStub(RemoteRef ref)
      Constructs a RemoteStub, with the specified remote reference.
